section5.intro: You agree not to engage in any of the following prohibited activities:

section6.title: 6. Wallet and Social Media Verification
section6.intro: To receive tokens, you must verify your wallet address and complete social media verifications:

section3.item2: To process task completions and award points
section3.item3: To distribute tokens to verified wallet addresses
section3.item4: To verify social media account ownership

section5.title: 5. Data Security
